name.zh: 轻便单肩斜挎胸包/单肩背包（多颜色）

description.en: A compact one-strap sling backpack designed for hands-free everyday carry. Features a secure main compartment, quick-access front pocket, and adjustable shoulder strap for left/right carry. Great for travel, commuting, and daily essentials. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), size, pocket layout, logo patch, lining, zippers (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 轻便单肩斜挎胸包/单肩背包，解放双手，适合通勤与旅行随身。主仓安全收纳，前袋便捷快取，肩带可调并可左右肩切换背负。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、口袋结构、Logo 工艺、内里、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：调节扣/旋转挂钩/D 环等（可定制）

en.Use Case: Daily sling backpack, travel day bag, light commute
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 18–24cm × 高 30–40cm × 深 8–12cm（可定制）
zh.结构: 1 主仓 + 前幅快取口袋
zh.背负方式: 单肩斜挎；支持左右肩切换
zh.适用场景: 日常胸包/旅行随身包/轻通勤
zh.颜色款式: 多 SKU 配色（见 variants）
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
